duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide acute care nursing services to patients in a healthcare setting
Deliver compassionate and effective patient care, ensuring the comfort and well-being of patients
Demonstrate critical thinking skills in the assessment and treatment of patients
Collaborate with healthcare teams to provide comprehensive patient care and support
Communicate effectively with patients, families, and healthcare professionals
Adapt to changing healthcare environments and patient needs
Manage time effectively to prioritize patient care tasks and responsibilities
Show empathy and understanding towards patients, advocating for their needs and concerns
